title: 103_hr4806
content: Equity in Educational Land-Grant Status Act of 1994 - Provides land-grant status for certain Indian colleges and institutions . Authorizes appropriations to establish an endowment for such Institutions in lieu of their extension. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to establish a 1994 Institutions Endowment Fund. Authorizes appropriations for: (1) the 1994 Institutions. And (2) related cooperative agreements. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make capacity building grants to such Institutions. Authorizes appropriations.
